dcterms:creator: M. Tavallaee
E. Bagheri
W. Lu
A. A. Ghorbani
dcterms:description: The NSL-KDD dataset is an updated and improved version of the KDDCup99 dataset, containing 41 features, of which 12 were extracted for use in the proposed approach. It serves as a simulator for network data and internet traffic, preferred by many authors due to its consistent size and reasonable features that aid in obtaining reliable classifiers.
dcterms:title: NSL-KDD

dcterms:description: The KDDCup99 dataset is an older dataset that has been used extensively for network intrusion detection tasks. It contains several problems that have been addressed in the NSL-KDD dataset.
dcterms:title: KDDCup99
